BronzeAge.name: Campaign Map Time Reduction
BronzeAge.description: Reduces the time to scout provinces on the Campaign Map by 2%.

BronzeAge.name: Attacker Boost
BronzeAge.description: Grants your attacking units a 6% boost on their attack and defense.

BronzeAge.name: Defender Boost
BronzeAge.description: Grants your defending units a 6% boost on their attack and defense.

BronzeAge.name: Friends Tavern Boost Cost Reduction
BronzeAge.description: Reduces the cost of all Friends Tavern boosts by 3%.

BronzeAge.name: Coin Collection
BronzeAge.description: Boosts all your coin collections in the city by 10%!

BronzeAge.name: Supply Collection
BronzeAge.description: Boosts all your supply collections in the city by 10%!

BronzeAge.name: Cultural Settlement Playthrough Reward
BronzeAge.description: Additional 5 Forge Points for any successful Cultural Settlement playthrough.

BronzeAge.name: Cultural Settlement Cooldown Reduction
BronzeAge.description: Reduces the cooldown after abandoning a Cultural Settlement by 6%.

BronzeAge.name: Attacker Boost
BronzeAge.description: Grants your attacking units a 9% boost on their attack and defense.

BronzeAge.name: Defender Boost
BronzeAge.description: Grants your defending units a 9% boost on their attack and defense.

BronzeAge.name: Campaign Map Time Reduction
BronzeAge.description: Reduces the time to scout provinces on the Campaign Map by 4%.

BronzeAge.name: Friends Tavern Boost Cost Reduction
BronzeAge.description: Reduces the cost of all Friends Tavern boosts by 4%.

BronzeAge.name: Wishing Well
BronzeAge.description: The wishing well produces a new surprise for you every day, maybe even Diamonds. And no need to ever renovate it: It progresses with you through all ages!

BronzeAge.name: Finish All Coin Productions
BronzeAge.description: Use this item to instantly finish all coin productions in your city. This does not apply to special productions or Great Buildings.

SpaceAgeJupiterMoon.description: The wishing well produces a new surprise for you every day, maybe even Diamonds. And no need to ever renovate it: It progresses with you through all ages!

SpaceAgeJupiterMoon.name: Finish All Coin Productions
SpaceAgeJupiterMoon.description: Use this item to instantly finish all coin productions in your city. This does not apply to special productions or Great Buildings.

BronzeAge.name: Antiques Dealer Slot
BronzeAge.description: Unlock an additional Antiques Dealer Slot to be able to exchange more items at once.

BronzeAge.name: Attacker Boost
BronzeAge.description: Grants your attacking units a 12% boost on their attack and defense.

BronzeAge.name: Defender Boost
BronzeAge.description: Grants your defending units a 12% boost on their attack and defense.

BronzeAge.name: Cultural Settlement Cooldown Reduction
BronzeAge.description: Reduces the cooldown after abandoning a Cultural Settlement by 8%.

BronzeAge.name: Campaign Map Time Reduction
BronzeAge.description: Reduces the time to scout provinces on the Campaign Map by 6%.

BronzeAge.name: Friends Tavern Boost Cost Reduction
BronzeAge.description: Reduces the cost of all Friends Tavern boosts by 5%.

BronzeAge.name: Coin Collection
BronzeAge.description: Boosts all your coin collections in the city by 15%!

BronzeAge.name: Supply Collection
BronzeAge.description: Boosts all your supply collections in the city by 15%!

BronzeAge.name: PvP Arena Attempts Time Reduction
BronzeAge.description: Reduces the time needed for PvP Arena Attempts to refill by 5%.

BronzeAge.name: Attacker Boost
BronzeAge.description: Grants your attacking units a 15% boost on their attack and defense.

BronzeAge.name: Defender Boost
BronzeAge.description: Grants your defending units a 15% boost on their attack and defense.

BronzeAge.name: Cultural Settlement Cooldown Reduction
BronzeAge.description: Reduces the cooldown after abandoning a Cultural Settlement by 10%.

BronzeAge.name: Campaign Map Time Reduction
BronzeAge.description: Reduces the time to scout provinces on the Campaign Map by 8%.

BronzeAge.name: Friends Tavern Boost Cost Reduction
BronzeAge.description: Reduces the cost of all Friends Tavern boosts by 6%.

BronzeAge.name: Coin Collection
BronzeAge.description: Boosts all your coin collections in the city by 20%!

BronzeAge.name: Supply Collection
BronzeAge.description: Boosts all your supply collections in the city by 20%!

BronzeAge.name: Rogue Hideout
BronzeAge.description: Recruit rogues to gain an advantage in battle: Rogues ignore the first hit and transform into a copy of another one of your units instead!

BronzeAge.name: Rogue Hideout Shrink Kit
BronzeAge.description: Use this Shrink Kit to make your Rogue Hideout more compact in size whilst still able to produce the same output

BronzeAge.name: Finish All Supply Productions
BronzeAge.description: Use this item to instantly finish all supply productions in your city. This does not apply to special productions or Great Buildings.

BronzeAge.name: Attacker Boost
BronzeAge.description: Grants your attacking units a 20% boost on their attack and defense.

BronzeAge.name: Defender Boost
BronzeAge.description: Grants your defending units a 20% boost on their attack and defense.

BronzeAge.name: Cultural Settlement Playthrough Reward
BronzeAge.description: Additional 10 Forge Points for any successful Cultural Settlement playthrough.

BronzeAge.name: Cultural Settlement Cooldown Reduction
BronzeAge.description: Reduces the cooldown after abandoning a Cultural Settlement by 12%.

BronzeAge.name: Campaign Map Time Reduction
BronzeAge.description: Reduces the time to scout provinces on the Campaign Map by 10%.

BronzeAge.name: Friends Tavern Boost Cost Reduction
BronzeAge.description: Reduces the cost of all Friends Tavern boosts by 7%.

BronzeAge.name: Coin Collection
BronzeAge.description: Boosts all your coin collections in the city by 25%!

BronzeAge.name: Supply Collection
BronzeAge.description: Boosts all your supply collections in the city by 25%!

BronzeAge.name: Wishing Well
BronzeAge.description: The wishing well produces a new surprise for you every day, maybe even Diamonds. And no need to ever renovate it: It progresses with you through all ages!

BronzeAge.name: Rogue Hideout
BronzeAge.description: Recruit rogues to gain an advantage in battle: Rogues ignore the first hit and transform into a copy of another one of your units instead!

BronzeAge.name: Rogue Hideout Shrink Kit
BronzeAge.description: Use this Shrink Kit to make your Rogue Hideout more compact in size whilst still able to produce the same output

BronzeAge.name: Finish All Supply Productions
BronzeAge.description: Use this item to instantly finish all supply productions in your city. This does not apply to special productions or Great Buildings.

BronzeAge.name: Attacker Boost
BronzeAge.description: Grants your attacking units a 25% boost on their attack and defense.

BronzeAge.name: Defender Boost
BronzeAge.description: Grants your defending units a 25% boost on their attack and defense.

BronzeAge.name: PvP Arena Attempts Time Reduction
BronzeAge.description: Reduces the time needed for PvP Arena Attempts to refill by 10%.

BronzeAge.name: Cultural Settlement Cooldown Reduction
BronzeAge.description: Reduces the cooldown after abandoning a Cultural Settlement by 20%.

BronzeAge.name: Campaign Map Time Reduction
BronzeAge.description: Reduces the time to scout provinces on the Campaign Map by 12%.

BronzeAge.name: Friends Tavern Boost Cost Reduction
BronzeAge.description: Reduces the cost of all Friends Tavern boosts by 9%.

BronzeAge.name: Coin Collection
BronzeAge.description: Boosts all your coin collections in the city by 40%!

BronzeAge.name: Supply Collection
BronzeAge.description: Boosts all your supply collections in the city by 40%!

BronzeAge.name: Cultural Settlement Playthrough Reward
BronzeAge.description: Additional 15 Forge Points for any successful Cultural Settlement playthrough.

BronzeAge.name: Cultural Settlement Cooldown Reduction
BronzeAge.description: Reduces the cooldown after abandoning a Cultural Settlement by 24%.

BronzeAge.name: Friends Tavern Boost Cost Reduction
BronzeAge.description: Reduces the cost of all Friends Tavern boosts by 10%.

BronzeAge.name: Coin Collection
BronzeAge.description: Boosts all your coin collections in the city by 50%!

BronzeAge.name: Supply Collection
BronzeAge.description: Boosts all your supply collections in the city by 50%!

BronzeAge.name: Emissary Slot
BronzeAge.description: An additional slot to activate an emissary in your Town Hall.

BronzeAge.name: Wishing Well
BronzeAge.description: The wishing well produces a new surprise for you every day, maybe even Diamonds. And no need to ever renovate it: It progresses with you through all ages!

BronzeAge.name: Rogue Hideout
BronzeAge.description: Recruit rogues to gain an advantage in battle: Rogues ignore the first hit and transform into a copy of another one of your units instead!

BronzeAge.name: Rogue Hideout Shrink Kit
BronzeAge.description: Use this Shrink Kit to make your Rogue Hideout more compact in size whilst still able to produce the same output

BronzeAge.name: Finish All Supply Productions
BronzeAge.description: Use this item to instantly finish all supply productions in your city. This does not apply to special productions or Great Buildings.

IronAge.description: Recruit rogues to gain an advantage in battle: Rogues ignore the first hit and transform into a copy of another one of your units instead!

IronAge.name: Rogue Hideout Shrink Kit
IronAge.description: Use this Shrink Kit to make your Rogue Hideout more compact in size whilst still able to produce the same output

IronAge.name: Finish All Supply Productions
IronAge.description: Use this item to instantly finish all supply productions in your city. This does not apply to special productions or Great Buildings.

BronzeAge.name: Attacker Boost
BronzeAge.description: Grants your attacking units a 30% boost on their attack and defense.

BronzeAge.name: Defender Boost
BronzeAge.description: Grants your defending units a 30% boost on their attack and defense.

BronzeAge.name: Additional Antiques Dealer Coins
BronzeAge.description: Gain 10% more Antiques Dealer Coins when exchanging items.

BronzeAge.name: Additional Antiques Dealer Gems
BronzeAge.description: Gain 15% more Antiques Dealer Gems when exchanging items that give Gems.

BronzeAge.name: Cultural Settlement Cooldown Reduction
BronzeAge.description: Reduces the cooldown after abandoning a Cultural Settlement by 28%.

BronzeAge.name: Campaign Map Time Reduction
BronzeAge.description: Reduces the time to scout provinces on the Campaign Map by 14%.

BronzeAge.name: Friends Tavern Boost Cost Reduction
BronzeAge.description: Reduces the cost of all Friends Tavern boosts by 12%.

BronzeAge.name: Coin Collection
BronzeAge.description: Boosts all your coin collections in the city by 60%!

BronzeAge.name: Supply Collection
BronzeAge.description: Boosts all your supply collections in the city by 60%!

BronzeAge.name: Cultural Settlement Cooldown Reduction
BronzeAge.description: Reduces the cooldown after abandoning a Cultural Settlement by 32%.

BronzeAge.description: Reduces the cost of all Friends Tavern boosts by 14%.

BronzeAge.name: PvP Arena Attempts Time Reduction
BronzeAge.description: Reduces the time needed for PvP Arena Attempts to refill by 15%.

BronzeAge.name: Coin Collection
BronzeAge.description: Boosts all your coin collections in the city by 70%!

BronzeAge.name: Wishing Well
BronzeAge.description: The wishing well produces a new surprise for you every day, maybe even Diamonds. And no need to ever renovate it: It progresses with you through all ages!

BronzeAge.name: Rogue Hideout
BronzeAge.description: Recruit rogues to gain an advantage in battle: Rogues ignore the first hit and transform into a copy of another one of your units instead!

BronzeAge.name: Rogue Hideout Shrink Kit
BronzeAge.description: Use this Shrink Kit to make your Rogue Hideout more compact in size whilst still able to produce the same output

BronzeAge.name: Finish All Supply Productions
BronzeAge.description: Use this item to instantly finish all supply productions in your city. This does not apply to special productions or Great Buildings.

BronzeAge.name: Cultural Settlement Playthrough Reward
BronzeAge.description: Additional 20 Forge Points for any successful Cultural Settlement playthrough.

BronzeAge.name: Coin Collection
BronzeAge.description: Boosts all your coin collections in the city by 80%!

BronzeAge.name: Supply Collection
BronzeAge.description: Boosts all your supply collections in the city by 80%!

BronzeAge.name: Attacker Boost
BronzeAge.description: Grants your attacking units a 35% boost on their attack and defense.

BronzeAge.name: Defender Boost
BronzeAge.description: Grants your defending units a 35% boost on their attack and defense.

BronzeAge.name: Friends Tavern Boost Cost Reduction
BronzeAge.description: Reduces the cost of all Friends Tavern boosts by 16%.

BronzeAge.name: Cultural Settlement Cooldown Reduction
BronzeAge.description: Reduces the cooldown after abandoning a Cultural Settlement by 38%.

BronzeAge.name: Campaign Map Time Reduction
BronzeAge.description: Reduces the time to scout provinces on the Campaign Map by 16%.

BronzeAge.name: Attacker Boost
BronzeAge.description: Grants your attacking units a 40% boost on their attack and defense.

BronzeAge.name: Defender Boost
BronzeAge.description: Grants your defending units a 40% boost on their attack and defense.

BronzeAge.name: Cultural Settlement Cooldown Reduction
BronzeAge.description: Reduces the cooldown after abandoning a Cultural Settlement by 44%.

BronzeAge.name: Friends Tavern Boost Cost Reduction
BronzeAge.description: Reduces the cost of all Friends Tavern boosts by 18%.

BronzeAge.name: Coin Collection
BronzeAge.description: Boosts all your coin collections in the city by 90%!

BronzeAge.name: Supply Collection
BronzeAge.description: Boosts all your supply collections in the city by 90%!

BronzeAge.name: Wishing Well
BronzeAge.description: The wishing well produces a new surprise for you every day, maybe even Diamonds. And no need to ever renovate it: It progresses with you through all ages!

BronzeAge.name: Rogue Hideout
BronzeAge.description: Recruit rogues to gain an advantage in battle: Rogues ignore the first hit and transform into a copy of another one of your units instead!

BronzeAge.name: Rogue Hideout Shrink Kit
BronzeAge.description: Use this Shrink Kit to make your Rogue Hideout more compact in size whilst still able to produce the same output

BronzeAge.name: Finish All Supply Productions
BronzeAge.description: Use this item to instantly finish all supply productions in your city. This does not apply to special productions or Great Buildings.

BronzeAge.name: Finish All Supply Productions

BronzeAge.name: Attacker Boost
BronzeAge.description: Grants your attacking units a 45% boost on their attack and defense.

BronzeAge.name: Defender Boost
BronzeAge.description: Grants your defending units a 45% boost on their attack and defense.

BronzeAge.name: Additional Antiques Dealer Coins
BronzeAge.description: Gain 15% more Antiques Dealer Coins when exchanging items.

BronzeAge.name: Additional Antiques Dealer Gems
BronzeAge.description: Gain 20% more Antiques Dealer Gems when exchanging items that give Gems.

BronzeAge.name: PvP Arena Attempts Time Reduction
BronzeAge.description: Reduces the time needed for PvP Arena Attempts to refill by 20%.

BronzeAge.name: Cultural Settlement Playthrough Reward
BronzeAge.description: Additional 25 Forge Points for any successful Cultural Settlement playthrough.

BronzeAge.name: Cultural Settlement Cooldown Reduction
BronzeAge.description: Reduces the cooldown after abandoning a Cultural Settlement by 50%.

BronzeAge.name: Campaign Map Time Reduction
BronzeAge.description: Reduces the time to scout provinces on the Campaign Map by 20%.

BronzeAge.name: Friends Tavern Boost Cost Reduction
BronzeAge.description: Reduces the cost of all Friends Tavern boosts by 20%.

BronzeAge.name: Coin Collection
BronzeAge.description: Boosts all your coin collections in the city by 100%!

BronzeAge.name: Supply Collection
BronzeAge.description: Boosts all your supply collections in the city by 100%!
